BELLA THORNE: LATEST NEWS, VIEWS, GOSSIP, PHOTOS AND VIDEO

Cody Simpson reflects on dating his 'first girlfriend' Kylie Jenner at age 15 and meeting Kanye West for the first time: 'As a young kid then, it was nuts' Cody Simpson has been linked to a string of high-profile women over the years, including Miley Cyrus, Gigi Hadid, Bella Thorne and Stella Hudgens. And the Gold Coast-raised singer, 25, has now revealed his first-ever girlfriend was in fact Kylie Jenner, whom he dated when he was just 15. Speaking to Fitzy & Wippa on Friday, Cody explained he was chasing a pop career in LA when they first got together, and also recalled sitting next to a surprisingly 'friendly' and 'normal' Kanye West at dinner in New York City at about the same time....read Cody Simpson on dating his 'first girlfriend' Kylie Jenner at age 15
